name: Phalsberg
overview: Phalsberg was developed and released in France in 1986 for the C64, then localized in English the next year. It is an open-world, turn-based role-playing game. The small planet of KALVOR made up of two continents: PRIMATERRA and KALIMATER. knew a peaceful happiness under the Halsberg reign of the good King PHILOXAL. When at the end of the 3rd millennium of the infamous Kalvorian calendar BLACKSTAR, commander of the Praetorian legions, seized PHILOXAL and set himself up as Grand Master of Kalvor. Aided by mercenaries, he succeeded in seizing the royal attributes which he dispersed on the continent. So you will have to find: - THE SACRED CROWN, -THE SCARAB OF THE ANCIENT CITIES, and -LE SCEPTRE D'OR
